original_text: But you know that Timothy has proved himself, because as a son with his father he has served with me in the work of the gospel.
korean_text: 디모데의 연단을 너희가 아나니 자식이 아버지에게 함같이 나와 함께 복음을 위하여 수고하였느니라

sentences.original_text: But you know that Timothy has proved himself
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 디모데가 자신을 증명했다는 것을 압니다

sentences.original_text: because as a son with his father
in the work of the gospel
